info.author: Neal Norwitz, MetaSlash, Inc.
info.description:
PyChecker is a tool for finding bugs in python source code.
It finds problems that are typically caught by a compiler for less
dynamic languages, like C and C++. Because of the dynamic nature of python,
some warnings may be incorrect; however, spurious warnings should be
fairly infrequent.
info.name: PyChecker

Because of the dynamic nature of python, some warnings may be incorrect; however, spurious warnings should be fairly infrequent.
